name: Quest Board
description: A hub of local governance or public administration; adventurers may seek permits, records, or appeal to authorities.
atmosphere: The quest board has an exciting, opportunity-filled atmosphere with the sound of adventurers discussing posted notices and the scent of fresh parchment. The air carries the promise of adventure and the essential nature of quest distribution, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of potential rewards and the excitement of new challenges waiting to be undertaken.
